segments.text: My gaze keeps returning to the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is so utterly neutral, despite the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate, completely in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost infuriating how calmly she stands in that growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer lack of awareness is truly baffling to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can an adult be so disengaged from their environment?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's missing everything: the flood, the children, the impending fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of frustration watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap her out of her trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a vivid depiction of how easily we can miss danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her unreactive demeanor is the most unsettling part of this drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR
